status.description: Indicates whether the request succeeded or failed.

message.description: Optional human-readable message with additional information or error details.

anyOf.description: When you only want the OCR outputs.
Lighter version of canonized collections that are for search based reasoning.
Complete canonized collection that has the best search based reasoning capabilities.
Specialized collection for category extractions of content.

pii.description: Whether this collection contains PII data.

anyOf.description: Standard personal data without specialized legal or health context.
Information with legal or regulatory implications (e.g., SSN, license numbers).
Protected health information subject to medical privacy regulations.

piiType.description: Label indicating the type of PII in this collection.

anyOf.description: Full individual name, e.g., "John Doe".
Location-related data such as addresses or coordinates.
Dates including birth, death, admission, discharge, etc.
Telephone numbers, mobile or landline.
Fax numbers for document transmission.
Email addresses used for personal or professional contact.
Government-issued Social Security Number.
Unique medical record identifier assigned by healthcare providers.
Identifier for health plan beneficiaries.
Financial account numbers like bank or credit accounts.
Licenses or certificates, e.g., driver's license, professional license.
Vehicle identification number or related vehicle data.
Devices or equipment identifiers, e.g., serial numbers.
Web addresses and URLs.
Internet Protocol addresses, e.g., IPv4 or IPv6.
Biometric data like fingerprints, retinal scans, voiceprints.
Photograph capturing a person's full face.
System-generated unique codes for identifying entities.

piiControls.description: Array of control identifiers for PII handling UI.

tags.description: Tags associated with this collection for filtering/search.

anyOf.description: Evaluation tier with limited features.
Individual developer tier for testing or hobby projects.
Entry-level tier for small teams or startups.
Scaled tier for growing teams with increased usage.
Enterprise-grade tier with custom SLAs and support.
Standard member with read/write access.
Administrator with full management permissions.

organization.description: Snapshot of the parent organization details.

members.description: Optional list of membership records for the organization.

organization.description: Optional organization details that appears in when retrieving by id or in extended lists

anyOf.description: Filter content based on the category instructions
Conceptualized versions of content. Useful for read heavy contexts
Feature extraction of labels.
Structured tabular data with rows and columns.

singleEntry.description: If true, only a single entry is allowed per document.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the category was created.

dateUpdated.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated.

categories.description: Optional list of categories in this collection that appears when retrieving by id or in extended lists

name.description: Human-readable name of the document (e.g., filename).

type.description: MIME type or custom type label of the document.

anyOf.description: Standard paginated document (e.g., PDF, Word).
Single-image input (e.g., JPG, PNG).
Audio file input for transcription or segmentation.
Video file input for frame and audio-layout processing.

layoutType.description: The layout parsing strategy applied to this document.

layoutNodes.description: Number of layout nodes generated during parsing.

tables.description: Whether the document contains tables to be parsed.

instructions.description: Custom instructions or notes for processing this document.

anyOf.description: Currently in progress.
Encountered an error.
Completed successfully.
Manually cancelled.
Not yet started.
Partially completed.
All steps completed.

status.description: Overall job status. Must be "ready" for the document to be considered processed at any level.

nodes.description: Status of the node extraction step.

edges.description: Status of the edge linking step.

vectors.description: Status of the vector generation step.

category.description: Status of the category assignment step. If the collection has any categories defined, this must be "ready" for the document to be fully processed.

type.description: MIME type or custom type label.

document.description: Optional snapshot of the document metadata at job creation.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the job was created.

dateUpdated.description: Timestamp when the job was last updated.

job.description: Optional processing job associated with this document.

type.description:
Element kind:
- `title`
- `subtitle`
- `list`
- `text`
- `table`
- `image`
- `csv`
- or any custom tag

content.description: Raw text or data content of the element.

index.description: Zero-based index of this element in the document flow.

page.description: One-based page number where this element appears.

items.description: Parsed layout element with ordering and pagination metadata.

description.description: Description of the visual content (objects or scene).

type.description: Optional detected type or label for the region.

items.description: Parsed region from a single image.

start.description: Start time as ISO 8601 or `HH:MM:SS` format.

end.description: End time as ISO 8601 or `HH:MM:SS` format.

objects.description: Visual regions detected within the video frame.

items.description: Parsed segment from a video file.

start.description: Start time as ISO 8601 or `HH:MM:SS` format.

end.description: End time as ISO 8601 or `HH:MM:SS` format.

description.description: Description or non-verbal context for the segment.

content.description: Transcribed text content of the audio segment.

items.description: Parsed segment from an audio file.

layout.description:
Parsed layout structure, varying by `layoutType`:
- `DocumentLayout[]` for text/image based documents
- `PhotoLayout[]` for images
- `VideoLayout[]` for videos
- `AudioLayout[]` for audio

metadata.description:
File metadata for the document.
- `size`: file size in bytes
- `pages`: number of pages (if applicable)
- `length`: duration in seconds (for audio/video)

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the document was created.

dateUpdated.description: Timestamp when the document was last updated.

documents.description: Optional list of documents within this collection that appears when retrieving by id or in extended lists

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the collection was created.

dateUpdated.description: Timestamp when the collection was last updated.
